mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT MCLASS_NM FROM GS_M_CLASS WHERE HCLASS_CD = 'G15' AND ODR = A.CNS_GB) AS cnsGbNm , A.CNSLE_NM , (SELECT MCLASS_NM FROM GS_M_CLASS WHERE HCLASS_CD = 'G18' AND ODR = A.CNS_STAT) AS cnsStatNm , B.CNS_RSVT_DT , B.CNS_RSVT_STRT_HOUR , B.CNS_RSVT_STRT_MIN , B.CASE_NO , C.CENTER_NM , C.WRITE_DT , MAX(C.WRITE_DT) FROM GS_PER_CNS AS A LEFT JOIN GS_PER_CNS_DTL AS B ON A.CNSLE_ID = B.CNSLE_ID LEFT JOIN GS_PER_INFO_AGRE AS C ON B.CNSLE_ID = C.CNSLE_ID WHERE A.CNSLE_ID = #{cnsleId}

SELECT MAS.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT MCLASS_NM FROM GS_M_CLASS WHERE HCLASS_CD = 'G15' AND ODR = A.CNS_GB) AS cnsGbNm , A.CNSLE_NM , (SELECT MCLASS_NM FROM GS_M_CLASS WHERE HCLASS_CD = 'G18' AND ODR = A.CNS_STAT) AS cnsStatNm , A.CNS_END_DT , B.CASE_NO , C.CENTER_NM , C.WRITE_DT FROM GS_PER_CNS AS A LEFT JOIN GS_PER_CNS_DTL AS B ON A.CNSLE_ID = B.CNSLE_ID AND A.CASE_NO = B.CASE_NO LEFT JOIN GS_PER_INFO_AGRE AS C ON B.CNSLE_ID = C.CNSLE_ID AND B.CASE_NO = C.CASE_NO WHERE A.CNSLE_ID = #{cnsleId}
ORDER BY C.WRITE_DT DESC ) AS MAS GROUP BY CASE_NO LIMIT 0,7

SELECT MAS.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT MCLASS_NM FROM GS_M_CLASS WHERE HCLASS_CD = 'G15' AND ODR = A.CNS_GB) AS cnsGbNm , A.CNSLE_NM , (SELECT MCLASS_NM FROM GS_M_CLASS WHERE HCLASS_CD = 'G18' AND ODR = A.CNS_STAT) AS cnsStatNm , A.GENDER , A.BIRTH_DT , A.MOBILE , B.CNS_RSVT_DT , B.CNS_RSVT_STRT_HOUR , B.CNS_RSVT_STRT_MIN , B.CASE_NO , C.CENTER_NM , C.WRITE_DT , D.EMAIL FROM GS_PER_CNS AS A LEFT JOIN GS_PER_CNS_DTL AS B ON A.CNSLE_ID = B.CNSLE_ID AND A.CASE_NO = B.CASE_NO LEFT JOIN GS_PER_INFO_AGRE AS C ON B.CNSLE_ID = C.CNSLE_ID AND B.CASE_NO = C.CASE_NO INNER JOIN GS_USER_M AS D ON A.CNSLE_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE A.CNSLE_ID = #{cnsleId} AND A.CASE_NO = #{caseNo} ) AS MAS GROUP BY CASE_NO
